ComicInfo.Summary:
S.B. 108: Two women introduce themselves to Sham. He turns into a green spiky lizardman and scares them away. Stiletto asks Sham for help fix the corruption in her country of Santa Avaricia. They attend a Senate hearing and Stiletto tries to speak out. Sham gets her out of trouble by turning into President Reagan. They sneak into Senator Bagley's office and confront him, escaping out the window. They confirm bribery by calling President Hotchkiss of Matrix. Sham goes on TV as Senator Bagley to denounce the corrupt Santa Avaricia government and threaten to expose the bribery to win the senator's silence.
Arrest!: Luger lies dead in the morgue, burnt. The coroner steps away and when he returns, a shadowy figure burns him to death. Amber and Sham see the news and wonder if Surge could have committed murder. A cop sees Surge and tries to arrest him, but Surge melts his gun. Lancer vows before the media to catch Surge. Surge tries to contact Kathy, but she's on a retreat, reflecting on her nightmares. Lancer attacks Surge. They fight and Lancer wins. Surge is locked up and a trial is arranged. Lancer basks in media attention. Kathy visits Surge but can't speak with him. She then asks Lancer to help Surge.
